result.title: Policy Report: enhancing migrants inclusion effectiveness through participation and ICT
result.description: This White Paper will summarize practices and approaches adopted in the first 2 years of REBUILD project It will aim institutional stakeholders at national and international level describing and presenting the key points and success factors of the research approach the coparticipation methodology and the technological solution adopted The report will be presented during a Policy Round Table organized in Bruxelles at M24
